description: Returns, adds, edits, and removes federation-related features such as role mappings and connected organization configurations.

ProjectId.description:
List that contains comma-separated key value pairs to map zones to geographic regions. These pairs map an ISO 3166-1a2 location code, with an ISO 3166-2 subdivision code when possible, to a unique 24-hexadecimal string that identifies the custom zone.

This parameter returns an empty object if no custom zones exist.

OrgId.description:
List that contains comma-separated key value pairs to map zones to geographic regions. These pairs map an ISO 3166-1a2 location code, with an ISO 3166-2 subdivision code when possible, to a unique 24-hexadecimal string that identifies the custom zone.

This parameter returns an empty object if no custom zones exist.

Profile.description: The profile is defined in AWS Secret manager. See [Secret Manager Profile setup](../../../examples/profile-secret.yaml).

ExternalGroupName.description: Unique human-readable label that identifies the identity provider group to whichthis role mapping applies.

FederationSettingsId.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies your federation.

Id.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies the role mapping.

OrgId.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies the organization that contains your projects.

RoleAssignments.description: Atlas roles and the unique identifiers of the groups and organizations associated with each role.
